intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues burst from the beach grass! An ambush!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol descends into battle without a second thought, eventually driving the rogues away.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat drove off rogues together.

success_outcomes.text: s_c immediately leaps to protect {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} Clanmates. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} ferocity in battle terrifies the rogues. Realizing that they've sorely underestimated the Clan cats, the rogues turn tail and run.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed when to_cat drove rogues off the territory.

success_outcomes.text: s_c revels in the battle, leaping into the fray with {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} teeth bared and claws unsheathed. The rogues are quickly driven away by the patrol.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed when to_cat drove rogues off the territory.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues are terrifyingly coordinated and use the patrol's shock and confusion against them. The patrol cats are picked off one by one, and only a couple manage to escape the slaughter.

history_text.scar: m_c was badly scarred when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.
history_text.death: m_c was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.

log.cats_from: to_cat failed to drive away rogues while on patrol with from_cat.

fail_outcomes.text: Taken by surprise, the patrol scatters and loses cohesion. The rogues are quick to take advantage of the confusion and r_c is badly wounded, forcing the patrol to retreat.

history_text.scar: m_c was badly scarred when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/poss} patrol.
history_text.death: m_c died of injuries sustained in a rogue ambush.

log.cats_from: to_cat failed to drive away rogues while on patrol with from_cat.

intro_text: As r_c is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues burst from the beach grass! An ambush!
decline_text: r_c turns tail and races away! The rogues have {PRONOUN/r_c/object} far outnumbered; warning the Clan is more important than playing the hero.

success_outcomes.text: Stunned for a moment, r_c is nearly caught in the teeth of the first rogue, but {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/manage/manages} to dodge and weave through the onslaught of attacks. Eventually, r_c escapes the fray and pelts towards camp with yowls of warning bursting from {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} lungs.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed to hear to_cat escaped a rogue ambush.

success_outcomes.text: s_c snarls at the rogues, outnumbered but not cowed. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/throw/throws} {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the intruders with such ferocity that the rogues are taken aback. Alarmed by the Clan cat's lack of fear and self-preservation, the rogues freeze. s_c sees {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} opportunity to run and takes it, racing back to the camp to gather more warriors and return.

log.cats_from: from_cat was amazed to hear to_cat took on a gang of rogues single-pawed.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c snarls at the rogues, outnumbered but not cowed. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/s_c/throw/throws} {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the intruders with such ferocity that the rogues are taken aback. The shock only lasts a moment before they descend on the warrior once more. Eventually, s_c has no choice but to escape before {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} killed.

log.cats_from: from_cat honored to_cat's heroic death in battle against a rogue ambush.

fail_outcomes.text: The rogues greatly outnumber r_c and have no trouble killing the lone cat. {PRONOUN/r_c/poss/CAP} body is discovered the next day, covered in wounds and cold.

history_text.death: m_c was killed when rogues ambushed {PRONOUN/m_c/object} while on a solo patrol.

log.cats_from: from_cat honors to_cat's death in battle against a rogue ambush.

intro_text: As the patrol is marking the border lines, a gang of rogues stalk out of the beach grass to confront the Clan cats!
decline_text: The patrol turns tail and races away! The borders are left open for the rogues to muddy.

success_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan cats are strong, however, and the rogues seem to be weakened by hunger. The patrol easily drives the intruders away.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard about to_cat's victory in battle against a gang of rogues.

success_outcomes.text: The rogues posture and jeer, eventually provoking a battle. The Clan cats are strong, however, and after a short fight, the rogues are forced to retreat.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard about to_cat's victory in battle against a gang of dangerous rogues.

success_outcomes.text: s_c takes the lead, confronting the gang with confidence. Eventually, the rogues admit that they've been struggling to find enough prey and were looking to steal richer territory from the Clan. Tensions are eased when s_c informs the rogues of a prey-rich forest outside of c_n territory.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed when to_cat convinced rogues to leave the territory.

intro_text: There are dark clouds on the horizon, and p_l wonders if the patrol should continue.
decline_text: The patrol decides to head back early.

success_outcomes.text: While it's pretty gray up there, the promised rain never comes.
The cats get wet in the rain, but the patrol is otherwise successful.
s_c makes a careful judgment, and the patrol keeps going. They stick to the clifftops, avoiding the low beaches as the rain begins to pour around them.

log.cats_from: to_cat made a smart choice to keep from_cat's patrol on high ground during heavy rain.

success_outcomes.text: It's not worth the risk - s_c convinces the patrol to head for home.

log.cats_from: from_cat thought the call from to_cat to head home early was wise.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour, and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away. Some manage to ride the waves, paddling for their lives, but many are lost forever.

history_text.death: This cat was drowned by floodwaters.

fail_outcomes.text: There is a downpour, and a sudden flood from the overflowing river sweeps all of the cats in the patrol away. p_l yowls out a warning, and most of the patrol is able to react fast and strike out strongly for passing pieces of driftwood, but r_c doesn't make it, sinking beneath the water.

history_text.death: m_c was drowned by floodwaters.

Injured, gasping for air and paddling desperately, r_c remembers enough of {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} training to keep an eye out for driftwood. {PRONOUN/r_c/subject/CAP} {VERB/r_c/sink/sinks} {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} claws into the first piece that's swept past {PRONOUN/r_c/object}. It saves {PRONOUN/r_c/poss} life.

With the little warning {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/have/has}, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} {VERB/r_c/spot/spots} a branch being carried by the water and {VERB/r_c/strike/strikes} out strongly for it. Hurt and shivering from both exhaustion and the cold, {PRONOUN/r_c/subject} nevertheless {VERB/r_c/cling/clings} to safety as the floodwaters run their course.

intro_text: While on patrol, r_c notices some suspicious pawprints in the wet sand on the beach.

success_outcomes.text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. r_c quickly hides {PRONOUN/r_c/self} in the grass on the sand dunes and sets up an ambush that sends the rogue fleeing off c_n territory.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat drove a rogue off the territory.

success_outcomes.text: r_c soon realizes that the pawprints smell of c_n. Someone must have wandered through this section of the border recently, but it's not a threat.
The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. s_c throws {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the rogue, hissing furiously, and drives them off c_n territory.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat drove a rogue off the territory.

success_outcomes.text: The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. s_c sets up a trap by using the tides to cut off the rogue's escape path. It makes the startled intruder cower to realize they've been caught and trapped by c_n, and they're escorted to the border with the lesson firmly learned.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat drove a rogue off the territory.

success_outcomes.text: Boldly, s_c follows the pawprints to a trespassing rogue and confronts them. Fur puffed up and scowling, {PRONOUN/s_c/subject} {VERB/s_c/demand/demands} the rogue leave c_n territory. Intimidated by {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence, the rogue gives in and leaves without a fight.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat scared a rogue off the territory.

fail_outcomes.text: It turns out they were r_c's own pawprints... r_c huffs with embarrassment, suddenly grateful {PRONOUN/r_c/subject}{VERB/r_c/'re/'s} alone.

The pawprints lead to a trespassing rogue. s_c throws {PRONOUN/s_c/self} at the rogue, hissing furiously, but this is one battle-hardened trespasser, and s_c isn't as good of a fighter as {PRONOUN/s_c/subject}'d like to think. The rogue escapes {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} grasp and runs off further into c_n territory.

history_text.death: m_c died of an injury inflicted by an invading rogue.

intro_text: The patrol catches the scent of a fox - but is it red or gray?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to pursue the fox.

success_outcomes.text: The red vixen smells of milk, and hopefully by driving her out of the territory, her litter won't be a threat to the Clan. If they don't starve, c_n will hunt them down - they do not share territory with foxes.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol drives away the red fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. It's brutal, but these fluffy baby foxes would one day have grown to be kit-killers and thieves.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: s_c displays incredible skill, driving the mother vixen out of the territory almost by {PRONOUN/s_c/self}. Now neither the red fox nor her cubs pose a threat to the Clan. It truly proves s_c's place as one of c_n's most talented and skillful fighters.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol overcomes the red vixen and drives her off thanks to a brilliant battle move by s_c at a critical moment. {PRONOUN/s_c/poss/CAP} bravery ensures the patrol's success, and the cats arrive back at camp singing {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} praises to make sure the Clan knows it.

log.cats_from: to_cat's bravery in a fight against a vixen greatly impressed from_cat.

success_outcomes.text: Led by p_l and with a heap of cooperation and teamwork, the patrol drives away the red fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. The coasts will be safe from both the threat the vixen posed this season, and the threat her cubs would've posed to c_n in the seasons to come.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: With so many cats working together in tight coordination, they manage to accomplish the near-impossible, killing the red mother vixen and ending the threat to the Clan that she and her cubs pose.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to kill a vixen and her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol killed a vixen and her cubs.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined, and the small patrol is beaten back. But this coast is c_n's, and they haven't given up. They may have lost this battle, but c_n will win this war.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox is vicious and determined. Although they lose this battle, through teamwork the cats manage to retreat without injury.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter but not a great one, and in a moment that embarrasses {PRONOUN/s_c/object} deeply, the rest of the patrol have to rescue {PRONOUN/s_c/object} from the red vixen.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a vixen.
history_text.death: m_c fell in a battle with a vixen.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.

fail_outcomes.text: Never threaten a mother's young - the red vixen kills r_c in the skirmish.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a red vixen.
history_text.death: m_c fell in battle with a red fox.

log.cats_from: from_cat heard that to_cat was unable to save r_c in a fight with a red vixen.
This is intended to balance the negative value associated with this cat's death. Report this text as a bug if you see it.

fail_outcomes.text: The mother red fox's snapping jaws leave r_c dripping blood on the sand, forcing the patrol to back off.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a red vixen.
history_text.death: m_c fell in battle with a red fox.

log.cats_from: to_cat and from_cat were unable to drive off a vixen together.

intro_text: The patrol catches the scent of a fox - but is it red or gray?
decline_text: The patrol decides not to pursue the fox.

success_outcomes.text: The stocky gray vixen they track down smells of milk, and though she's nearly double the weight of any of the patrol and all of its muscle, they meet her eyes squarely and leap to attack. c_n does not tolerate sharing their territory with foxes, and they work together to drive her off.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive a vixen out of their territory.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove a vixen out of their territory.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol drives away the gray fox, seeks out her den, and kills her young cubs. It's brutal, but these fluffy baby foxes would one day have grown to be kit-killers and thieves. Better to deal with them now than when they're the height and nearly double the weight of a cat, though a gray fox will always be easier than a big red one.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive off a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: s_c displays incredible skill, driving the mother vixen out of the territory almost by {PRONOUN/s_c/self}. Now neither the gray fox nor her cubs pose a threat to the Clan. It places s_c as one of c_n's most talented and skillful fighters; a gray fox is a dangerous competitor.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol finds a stocky gray vixen wandering their coast, and drives her out in a scene that mostly involves yowling and screaming and yapping at each other until she gives in. r_c gets a little battered, but everyone is mostly fine.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a gray vixen.
history_text.death: m_c died after a battle with a gray vixen.

success_outcomes.text: The patrol overcomes the gray vixen they find and drives her off thanks to a brilliant battle move by s_c. The cats swirl around s_c afterwards, congratulating {PRONOUN/s_c/object} on {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} bravery and skill.

log.cats_from: from_cat was extremely impressed by to_cat's skill in battle against a vixen.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

success_outcomes.text: With so many cats working together in tight coordination, they're able to keep the gray vixen they find pinned and distracted as they wear her down. The fox eventually flees for her den, and the patrol follows to take care of the cubs she's raising.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat worked together to drive out a vixen and kill her cubs.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove out a vixen and killed her cubs.

success_outcomes.text: Bravely, s_c charges the gray fox, yowling threats. The vixen spooks and skitters up a tree, growling and barking in a squeaky tone, and s_c follows her up into the branches. As the rest of the patrol backs {PRONOUN/s_c/object} up from the ground, s_c screams until the fox is cowering and afraid, then lets her flee.

log.cats_from: from_cat was impressed by how to_cat chased a gray vixen up into a tree.
from_cat heard about how to_cat's patrol drove off a vixen.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol comes across a gray vixen at the end of the scent trail. She spots them too, measures herself up against them, then flees, scrambling up the cliffs of the headland in a move that completely surprises the cats. This round goes to the gray fox.

log.cats_from: from_cat and to_cat were unable to drive a gray vixen off their territory together.

fail_outcomes.text: s_c is determined to win, but {PRONOUN/s_c/poss} confidence is misplaced. {PRONOUN/s_c/subject/CAP}{VERB/s_c/'re/'s} a good fighter, but not a great one, and the stocky gray vixen is all muscle, barging past s_c and knocking {PRONOUN/s_c/object} rump over paws as she flees from the patrol.

history_text.scar: m_c carries a scar from a fight with a gray vixen.
history_text.death: m_c died after a battle with a gray vixen.

log.cats_from: to_cat's overconfident move in a fight against a vixen cost from_cat's patrol the battle.

intro_text: As the cats move along the shoreline, they spot something massive moving beneath the water.
decline_text: The cats are feeling remarkably incurious today.

success_outcomes.text: It's Nessie! The patrol trots up, exchanging a nice mouse for a nice deep-water fish, both creatures trading the respective delicacies that are hard for the other to obtain.

fail_outcomes.text: The patrol is so wrapped up trying to work out what the creature is that r_c topples into the water. It solves the mystery though, as Nessie propels r_c back onto the shoreline with one gentle, immense flipper.

intro_text: p_l waves r_c over with {PRONOUN/p_l/poss} tail. What's that?!
decline_text: r_c isn't interested, and the patrol continues on their way.

success_outcomes.text: The massive frog-Twoleg creeps up the rocks, slow and unnatural. The patrol watches, breathless, until it's out of sight. Well, p_l huffs. Maybe toads grow bigger than {PRONOUN/p_l/subject} thought. Terrifying.

fail_outcomes.text: Frozen, the cats watch the massive lumbering frog, the size of a Twoleg and just as bipedal. It halts and, like the rumble of thunder, issues a massive croak that creaks like cracking wood. All r_c can do is shiver.
